segments.text: That sink is disgusting with water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is gross; it's going to make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's stepping in it without a care, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her towel on that plate looks damp already from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are adding to the mess by climbing around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cracker crumbs from the cookie jar will be all over soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting in that wet spot; filthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing cabinets get water damage like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is neat, but inside it's a pigsty waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinet doors are just inviting more dirt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole careless scene turns my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it's unbearable.
segments.speaker: PAR
